meanings.definition: To undergo seroconversion, especially in response to a virus or infection.
meanings.sent1: After being exposed to the virus, the individual began to seroconvert and develop antibodies.
meanings.sent2: It is common for the body to seroconvert when fighting off infections.
meanings.sent3: The virus was surprised to see the body seroconvert so quickly.
meanings.sent4: Her immune system seroconverted like a superhero gaining new powers.
meanings.sent5: The process of seroconversion is like the body learning to fight off invaders.
